attributes.action: Allow driving tests and lessons for Keyworkers
attributes.additional_details: Keyworkers have to travel to their jobs through lockdown, allow them to take their driving test and lessons to do so.
attributes.background: Allow all essential and keyworkers to take driving tests and lessons through lockdown to allow them to travel to their place of work.
